kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : pymysql.connect(db=dbfree_db, user=dbfree_db, passwd=12345678, host=db4free.net, port=3306, charset=None)

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | Insert into Products (product_id,productname,description) values (67,'box','justname')

kw.name: Row Count Is Equal To X
kw.doc: Check if the number of rows returned from `selectStatement` is equal to the value submitted. If not, then this will throw an AssertionError. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Row Count Is Equal To X | Select * from Products where product_id=67 | 1
Executing : Row Count | Select * from Products where product_id=67
